text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
MEMORANDUM
TO: NAEB BOARD OF DIRECTORS
FROM: W. G. Harley March 15, 1973
The NAEB Newsletters are providing periodic general
reports of the turbulent happenings in public
broadcasting; this is intended to be a confidential
behind-the-scenes briefing for the Board.
This package contains:
1. A Situation Report
2. Minutes of the Executive Committee
Meeting of March 7, including
a. Copy of my Remarks to the Executive
Committee
b. Copy of my statement on Organizational
Options and Positive and Negative
Aspects of Each.
3. Personal Observation
4. Schedule of Upcoming Events
1346 CONNECTICUT AVENUE N.W. WASHINGTON, D.C. 20036 (202) 785-1100
